attributes.action: Remove the current Speaker of the House of Commons , John Bercow.
attributes.additional_details: He recently went against the advice of the Clerk of the House and allowed an amendment to be made in a debate.That, with allegations of bullying and abusing the position of Speaker, make him unfit to serve .
attributes.background: He has brought Parliament and his office into disrepute .

rejection.details: The resignation of an MP, including the Speaker, would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
